packages.name: Basic
packages.description: An efficient exterior and light interior detail that restores a clean, fresh look—ideal for routine maintenance at an affordable price.

packages.name: Standard
packages.description: A well-rounded package combining exterior shine and interior freshness—perfect for monthly upkeep or after a long trip.

packages.name: Premium
packages.description: A full-service detailing experience that revives your car’s exterior and rejuvenates your cabin—great for seasonal deep cleaning.

packages.name: Luxury
packages.description: Premium care for your vehicle with advanced protection and complete interior renewal—ideal for cars needing a next-level refresh.

packages.name: Exclusive
packages.description: Top-tier detailing with ceramic options, engine cleaning, and complete interior attention—crafted for vehicles that deserve perfection.

packages.name: VIP
packages.description: A two-day transformation for your car, including polishing, multi-layer ceramic, and full interior restoration—our most luxurious and protective package.

packages.name: Pre-Sale Preparation
packages.description: Designed to maximize resale value—this package restores your vehicle’s shine, refreshes the interior, and includes a pro photo shoot to help it sell faster.
